      • getMax

        public static int getMax(int[] inputArray,
                         boolean secondMax)
        it returns the maximum value and second max value from the array of dice values
        Parameters:
        inputArray - dice-values the array of the dice values rolled
        secondMax - secondMax if second max is true, then second max value is returned. else only the max value is returned.
        Returns:
        int it returns the maximum value or second max value based on the value of secondMax flag

        Parameters:

        max - maximum range of random value
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        return ArrayList of countries with army count more than one.
